name: Coin Thanksgiving
description:
Happy Thanksgiving’s Day, my dear friends!

It’s time to enjoy the feast of Turkey’s Day.
Huge roasted turkey, berries, pumpkins, cakes, muffins, fruits and wine.
We have just prepared them all for you.

But especially for this year, the feast will be more about
LOTS OF AND LOTS OF THANKSGIVING COINS ON THE DINNER TABLE.
